plugin.name: GameServer_command_plugin
plugin.author: Texdarkstar
plugin.purpose: lets you send any non command as a chat. Prefix a command with a '.'

alias.send:
cmd = tostring("%1") out = ""
if string.sub(cmd, 0, 1) ~= '.' then out = tostring("chat " .. cmd) else out = tostring(string.sub(cmd, 2, -1)) end
Send(out)
